item.description:
Hi Packers,

I hope you all had a great summer and are relaxed and rested, but I am delighted it’s finally over and looking forward to a new football season. This year’s first game is at home to the 49ers at 4.15pm on Sunday September 9th, the group will be meeting on the 2nd floor of the Banshee, and there are some new TV’s and brand new A/C on both floors. Last year was disappointing it the way the season finished so early but this one will be different, we had some huge crowds out for games last year so hopefully we can keep it up, as usual any and all suggestions are welcome, I will let you know each week about beer specials and of course game meetups. If you have any questions, concerns or suggestions either reply to the meetup form or email me privately at ray@bansheeboston.com

Have a great week and Go Pack,

Ray Butler

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: San Francisco @ Green Bay
